title: East Coast Adventure
content:
If you're in NYC and not busy this Friday (April 18) night, Patty and I will be at the Morgan Library after 7, and then going for drinks.

Not busy Sunday (April 20) a.m.? Doin' brunch with Ricardo and others on the UWS (email Ricardo for info, as I won't be around a computer much until next week).

Will be in Wilkes-Barre PA after that for two weeks, and then heading south to Maryland for May 3/4; contact me through my profile if you want to meet up.
author: Linda Cunningham
